intro.quote:
We can't buy happiness, but we can buy beer and at Catraio these two things are pratically the same!!!
I like my water with barley and hops !!!
intro.author: Manuel Oliveira, via Facebook

catraio.main_text:
Welcome to the world of craft beer. Catraio Craft Beer Shop is a bar and shop and a meeting point for those who love good craft beer.
At Catraio, you’ll be among friends to discover and enjoy new flavors, aromas and experiences. We offer you a laid-back place to relax in downtown Porto, whether at the terrace at Rua de Cedofeita or at the beer garden, during the summer.
We are a platform of promotion of craft beer, where you can find over 100 national and international brands, as well as a passionate team, who is available to help you choose your beer. You can also take part in the release of new beers, in meet the brewer and tap takeover events, tastings and workshops. And you can also take Catraio home, by buying at our shop.
In 2015, we opened the first craft beer bar/shop in Porto and were pioneers in this new trend in Portugal. Today, we keep committed in celebrating this culture and discovering new beers to showcase them to you.

bar.title: Take Away Beers
bar.description:
Here you can find the list of beers we sell on bottle that you can take home or as gift for someone.
We have growlers and discounts for packs of over four beers. Ask for more information at the shop.

taps.title: Beers To Enjoy With Us!
taps.description: Explore below to find which beers are on tap. And if you want to know what´s available on bottle at the bar, check our “$t(bar.title)”.

shop.title: Merchandising Catraio
shop.description: This is our statement: We love beer! We love Catraio!
